Name: market for transport, freight, light commercial vehicle | transport, freight, light commercial vehicle | EN15804GD, U
Category: H:Transportation and storage/49:Land transport and transport via pipelines/492:Other land transport/4923:Freight transport by road
Description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/20924/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This is the market for  'transport, freight, light commercial vehicle', in the geography of South Africa.;This market contains no transport or losses, as they are irrelevant for the delivered product.;This is delivering the service of transportation of 1 metric ton across the distance of 1 km. This service only considers the transportation of goods. The vehicle operates with diesel or petrol, while its production  is based of the Golf A4. Its life time performance is assumed to be 239,000 pkm. 

The activity starts with the transport service by light commercial vehicle.

The activity ends with the supply of the transport activity.
